projects.name: FSEChat Room
projects.title: Real Time Chat Room Web App
projects.description: FSEChat is a registered required chat room web app using the standard web stack (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), Node.js with express.js framework, socket.io, and MYSQL. Features includes user authentication and messaging and implement with RESTful API services based on Object-Oriented Programming and MVC architecture.

projects.name: HOMIE
projects.title: Housework Management Web App
projects.description: HOMIE is a cloud-based app built with React, Redux, D3.js, and Firebase. Built member, group and task management and point reward feature with Firebase Authentication, Cloud Firestore, and Firebase Storage.

projects.name: STYLiSH
projects.title: eCommerce Clothes Shopping Site
projects.description: STYLISH is a fashion clothes e-commerce shop, implemented with HTML, CSS, and AJAX.  Added third party login features with Facebook and Google OAuth API. Developed the shopping cart feature combining Web Storage API and third-party payment service. Leveraged Socket.io to implement the realtime customer service.

projects.name: NS Watcher
projects.title: Android App Intro Website
projects.description: Developed and deployed the introduction website using HTML, CSS, and Javascript and optimized with RWD, SEO, and Google Analytics.
